dmca.title: Demonstrating That It Appreciates The Golden Rule, Sharman Sends Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

This firm serves as outside litigation counsel for Sharman License Holdings, Ltd. and Sharman Networks Ltd. (collectively, "Sharman"). As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
